description: Per-node deep dive — status, events, timeline, and health

targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeGroup(timestamp, $__interval) AS time, event_name AS metric, count(*) AS cnt
FROM events_view
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND node_id = '$node_id'
  AND event_group IN ($event_group)
  AND event_name IN ($event_name)
GROUP BY 1, 2 ORDER BY 1

SELECT $__timeGroup(timestamp, $__interval) AS time, event_group AS metric, count(*) AS cnt
FROM events_view
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND node_id = '$node_id'
  AND event_group IN ($event_group)
  AND event_name IN ($event_name)
GROUP BY 1, 2 ORDER BY 1

SELECT timestamp AS time, event_group, event_name, data::text AS data
FROM events_view
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND node_id = '$node_id'
  AND event_group IN ($event_group)
  AND event_name IN ($event_name)
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 200

list.name: node_id
list.label: Node
list.description: Select a node ID — dynamically loaded from the API.

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT group_name FROM event_types ORDER BY 1
list.name: event_group
list.label: Event Group
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT group_name FROM event_types ORDER BY 1

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT name FROM event_types WHERE group_name IN ($event_group) ORDER BY 1
list.name: event_name
list.label: Event Name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT name FROM event_types WHERE group_name IN ($event_group) ORDER BY 1

title: TART-node
